item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction # This is bold text, and this is emphasized text. Ha. Except it is neither bold nor emphasised! Also not getting line breaks here. Visit the Hugo website!

item.title: The Society for Classical and Authentic Music
Great review for ‘Schaduwee’
item.description: Well, Gareth and I got a really excellent review for our concert last night from Michael Tumelty in the Glasgow Herald; ‘Let’s not mess about. Never mind technical shortcomings, rough edges, the fractured tenor who was clearly in discomfort. Last night’s offering by RSAMD students in the academy’s festival of new music, Plug, gets five stars for the originality of creative thought that flowed from student composers Simon van der Walt and Gareth Williams into two new works for theatrical performance.
